pytket-aqt
==========

```pytket`` <https://cqcl.github.io/pytket>`__ is a Python module for
interfacing with CQC t|ket>, a set of quantum programming tools.

``pytket_aqt`` is an extension to ``pytket`` that allows ``pytket``
circuits to be executed on AQT's quantum devices and simulators.

Getting started
---------------

``pytket_aqt`` is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on Linux and
MacOS. To install, run:

``pip install pytket_aqt``
